definitions.definition: To express (a quantity such as an interest rate, profit, expenditure etc.) as if it applied or were measured over one year.
examples: To annualise net profit, divide the year-to-date net profit by the number of completed months, and multiply by twelve.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To express (a quantity such as an interest rate, profit, expenditure etc.) as if it applied or were measured over one year.
